channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Google doesn’t have to sell Chrome but must share some data with rivals to resolve monopoly case
item.description: A federal judge on Tuesday ordered a shake-up of Google’s search engine in an attempt to curb the corrosive power of an illegal monopoly while rebuffing the U.S. government’s attempt to break up the company and impose other restraints.

item.title: Quick-moving wildfire scorches historic California gold mining town, burning multiple homes
Missouri takes up Trump’s redistricting effort in Republican push to win more US House seats
